Package com.company.rest.products.model

Class CatalogWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.rest.products.model.CatalogWrapper
  • @Component
public class CatalogWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction over the Square Catalog Java API. Used extensively by SquareService.
    See Also:
    SquareClient, CatalogApi, SquareService

    • Constructor Summary

      CatalogWrapper​(java.lang.String accessToken)

      • retrieveObject

        public com.squareup.square.models.RetrieveCatalogObjectResponse retrieveObject​(@NonNull
                                                                               @NonNull ProductGetRequestBody getRequest)
                                                                        throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                                                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sends a retrieve (GET) request to the Square API.
        Parameters:
        getRequest - A ProductGetRequestBody containing the Square - provided ID of the product to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An instance of BatchRetrieveCatalogObjectsResponse which contains the data requested from the Square API.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if Square throws it to us.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if Square throws it to us.
        See Also:
        RetrieveCatalogObjectResponse

      • deleteObject

        public com.squareup.square.models.DeleteCatalogObjectResponse deleteObject​(@NonNull
                                                                           @NonNull ProductDeleteRequestBody deleteRequest)
                                                                    throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                                                                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Sends a DELETE(id) request to the Square API. Note that Square soft-deletes; you can still use the List Catalog call to find deleted CatalogObject instances, which will, however, have the field is_deleted set to true.
        Parameters:
        deleteRequest - A ProductDeleteRequestBody containing the unique ID Square provided to the CatalogObject to be deleted.
        Returns:
        An instance of DeleteCatalogObjectResponse which contains the data that the Square API sent us after a successful or unsuccessful deletion.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - if Square throws it to us.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if Square throws it to us.
        See Also:
        CatalogApi.deleteCatalogObjectAsync(String), CatalogApi.deleteCatalogObject(String)
